oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Soldiers on a truck in Qui Nhon
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law. Users are solely responsible for determining the existence of such instances and for obtaining any other permissions and paying associated fees that may be necessary for the intended use.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Eight soldiers posing in and around a truck in Qui Nhon. Chris Ammons is standing in the center wearing glasses, helmet, and flak jacket. Other soldiers wear hats, helmets, or no headgear at all. Only one carries an M16.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mountains; Military facilities; Trucks; Cities & towns
Vietnam War, 1961-1975; Vietnam; Qui Nhon (Vietnam)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ammons, Christopher D., 1948-
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This photograph was taken during a general's visit to the signal base at Vung Chua Mountain and to the city of Qui Nhon. The 61st Security Detachment was assigned the task of securing the area ahead of the general's arrival.
